Electronic Countermeasures cover all systems carried by Troopers, Vehicles and TAGs with the goal of disrupting and deactivating enemy guided projectiles, Comms Attacks etc. depending on the type of ECM they are equipped with.

{{css_skillbox |black|  ECM | AUTOMATIC EQUIPMENT }}
{{requirements}}
* In order to use this Automatic Equipment, its owner must be the target of the Attack type listed in round brackets.
{{effects}}
* ECM imposes a series of negative MODs on the Enemy when they attempt to Attack the Trooper that owns it.
* Both the affected Attack type and the MOD that it imposes are listed in the [[Unit Profile]] of the Trooper.
{{css_skillbox-end}}
